outputs.output_descr: The project will help mainstream sustainable land management by integrating land resource and degradation issues into national development planning processes, and help strengthen information management systems through the use of GIS in land use decision making, and establish monitoring and evaluation systems.

The project will help mainstream sustainable land management by integrating land resource and degradation issues into national development planning processes, and help strengthen information management systems through the use of GIS in land use decision making, and establish monitoring and evaluation systems.

project_descr: CAPACITY BUILDING FOR SUSTAINABLE LAND MANAGEMENT IN TUVALU
